categories.title: Recent ElizaOS Updates: UI Improvements and Bug Fixes

content.text:
# UI and Layout Improvements

Several enhancements have been made to improve the user interface and layout in ElizaOS:

- The profile UI and layout have been improved (PR #4021)
- The memory viewer has been enhanced for better usability (PR #4027)
- The action viewer UI has been improved (PR #4039)
- Home page layout improvements have been implemented, including a new create button (PR #4013)
- Stack functionality has been improved (PR #4010) with maxStack being added back (PR #4014)

# Bug Fixes

Several bugs have been addressed in recent updates:

- Fixed CLI agent command (PR #4028)
- Resolved profile overflow issue (PR #4025)
- Fixed OpenAI speech-to-text functionality (PR #4017)
- Adjusted grid size (PR #4015)
- Fixed room stack issues (PR #4011)
- Resolved profile picture display for group chats (PR #4008)
- Fixed UX issues with start and create functions (PR #4007)

# Group Chat Enhancements

Improvements to group chat functionality:

- Added the ability to update agents status in group chats (PR #4012)
- Fixed profile picture display for group chats (PR #4008)

# Documentation and Testing

Updates to documentation and test coverage:

- Updated README.md (PR #4006)
- Updated intro.md documentation (PR #4005)
- Improved plugin storage S3 test coverage (PR #3976)

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several significant pull requests have been made to the elizaOS/eliza repository, focusing on UI improvements, bug fixes, and new features:

- Documentation updates with visual improvements and core cleanup (PR #4032)
- Implementation of partial agent update functionality (PR #4026)
- Bug fixes for CLI character parameter and plugin-solana issues (PR #4016)
- UI enhancements including a new create button and home page layout improvements (PR #4013)
- Addition of redpill support (PR #4045)
- Integration of Groq functionality (PR #4044)
- New DPSN Plugin feature (PR #4043)
- Improved action viewer UI (PR #4039)
- Added drag & drop functionality for environment file uploading (PR #4033)

These updates collectively enhance the user interface, fix existing bugs, and expand the platform's capabilities with new plugins and features.

categories.title: Recent Issues in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub Repository

content.text:
Several issues have been reported in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository:

1. Issue #4020: Users are experiencing failures when trying to fetch agent lists using the 'npx elizaos agent list' command.

2. Issue #4009: There's a version discrepancy in the client, which is reported to be 1 point behind the expected version.

3. Issue #4037: Users are encountering package resolution problems, specifically with the '@elizaos/plugin-openai' package when using beta packages.

4. Issue #4034: A request or discussion about creating a Golang port of the project.

5. Issue #4042: Users are experiencing an error with UUID syntax: 'invalid input syntax for type uuid: "-1002129157442"'.

6. Issue #4040: There appears to be a rate limit issue with Groq tokens per minute (TPM), with a limit of 6000 tokens.

The elizaos/eliza repository showed significant activity over a two-day period. From March 20-21, 2025, there were 22 new pull requests with 16 of them merged, 5 new issues created, and 19 active contributors working on the project. Activity decreased slightly on the following day (March 21-22, 2025) with 9 new pull requests (only 1 merged), 4 new issues, and 14 active contributors.
sources: From 2025-03-20 to 2025-03-21, elizaos/eliza had 22 new PRs (16 merged), 5 new issues, and 19 active contributors.
From 2025-03-21 to 2025-03-22, elizaos/eliza had 9 new PRs (1 merged), 4 new issues, and 14 active contributors.
